creator: foxyshadis@hotmail.com
text:
On the download page, the link to the win32 binaries are in this format:

apache_2.0.46-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi

The actual filename of the binaries since 2.0.46 is:

apache_2.0.46-win32-x86-no_src.msi

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text: oops!!! my fault.  good catch, thanks!  no wonder the mirrors were complaining about 404's.  ;)
